metadata.title: USN-6667-1 -- Cpanel-JSON-XS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Cpanel-JSON-XS incorrectly decoded certain data. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Cpanel-JSON-XS to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6667-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcpanel-json-xs-perl - 4.19-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
